title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run large language models locally with a simple CLI and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich open-source web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starter available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama HTTP API; chat, embed, list models, built-in retries.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive Rust CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history, fuzzy finder.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda community connector exposing Ollama models as BPMN service tasks (Java).

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama server, CUDA support, WebUI, and Open-WebUI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Kubernetes with autoscaling, PVC, ingress, GPU nodes.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapping ollama-js; decorators for chat, embed, list models, Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer pooling, streaming, and telemetry events.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with thread replies.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with model manager, chat history export, dark theme.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models, null-safe, Riverpod example included.
